entry.title: 3M AB27411 - 3M Stikit Gold Paper Sheet Roll 216U, 2-3/4 in x 30 yd P100 A-weight, 10 per case AB27411 7000119166
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 57.46

[shortdesc]

3M Stikit Gold Paper Sheet Roll 216U, 2-3/4 in x 30 yd P100 A-weight, 10 per case

  • 3M Stikit Gold Paper Sheet Roll 216U is designed for convenience, combining open coat aluminum oxide abrasive with a handy adhesive backing ready for quick and easy attachment to our 3M Stikit hand pad (sold separately) for finishing applications
  • The sheet roll means the paper can be used on 2-3/4 inch wide Stikit hand pads in a variety of lengths.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Canada

    Product Information

  • Convenient sheet roll form enables use with 2-3/4 Inch width Stikit hand pads of various lengths
  • Aluminum oxide mineral is durable, cuts fast, and performs well on many surfaces
  • A-weight light paper backing is suitable for hand sanding and finishing applications
  • Open coat construction provides a more aggressive cut and minimizes dust clogging on the abrasive for increased productivity
  • Load-resistant coating helps prevent premature loading of the disc surface to maximize cut and extend the life of the abrasive grains
    		•

entry.title: 3M AB05025 - 3M Utility Cloth Roll 211K, 1-1/2 in x 50 yd 220 J-weight, 5 per case AB05025 7000118344
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 56.81

[shortdesc]

3M Utility Cloth Roll 211K, 1-1/2 in x 50 yd 220 J-weight, 5 per case

  • The 3M™ Utility Cloth Roll 211K is a light, J-weight cloth abrasive ideal for general maintenance work
  • This closed coat, aluminum oxide abrasive comes in a range of grades for common applications like repairing metal finishes, removing rust, deburring, blending, and surface preparation for paints and coatings.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Tough aluminum oxide abrasive mineral cuts fast and performs well on a wide range of minerals
  • Flexible cloth backing makes a good general purpose abrasive for dry sanding
  • Closed coat construction provides a consistent, fine finish
  • Glue bond yields uniform, fine finishes in dry applications
  • Available in grades from 80 to 500 and make-to-order converted forms

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Utility Rolls
Price: 25.99

[shortdesc]

3M Utility Cloth Roll 314D, 1-1/2 in x 50 yd P220 J-weight, 5 per case

  • 3M Utility Cloth Roll 314D provides light-weight cloth sanding strips used for hand sanding in many different applications
  • Constructed with aluminum oxide abrasive, our utility rolls come in a range of grades for common applications such as deburring, blending and repairing metal finishes, rust or other contaminant removal, and surface preparation for paints and coatings.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Grit 220
    Length 50yds
    Width 1-1/2 Inch
    Material 314D
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Origin Country Mexico
    Product Type Utility Rolls

    Product Information

  • Versatile aluminum oxide abrasive roll can be used on metal, wood, and plastic
  • Cloth backing is both flexible and durable to withstand heavy use
  • Strips can be torn to size and wound around circular pieces, twisted to fit cylinders, or folded to reach into corners
  • Handy packaging provides portability

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 40.75

[shortdesc]

3M Hookit Blue Abrasive Sheet Roll, 321U, 36190, 150, 2-3/4 in x 13 yd (69.85 mm x 11.88 m)

  • From body repair to paint prep, 3M™ Blue Abrasives are all you need
  • Engineered with a ceramic mineral blend, 3M™ Hookit™ Blue Abrasive Sheet Rolls deliver best-in-class performance at every stage, with a specially-designed multi-hole pattern that helps reduce loading and extend disc life, while easily aligning with most backup pads.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Canada

    Product Information

  • Best-in-class performance with the right balance of ceramic grain and aluminum oxide
  • Anti-loading coating helps prevent dust and debris from clogging the surface
  • Multi-hole pattern delivers excellent dust extraction and reduces loading
  • Upgraded resins improve durability and finish
  • 3M™ Hookit™ Sheets are easy to attach, remove and reuse

entry.title: 3M AB20400 - 3M Cartridge Roll 747D, 3/8 in x 1-1/2 in x 1/8 in 80 X-weight, 100 per case, Obsolete AB20400 7100094661
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 0.89

[shortdesc]

3M Cartridge Roll 747D, 3/8 in x 1-1/2 in x 1/8 in 80 X-weight, 100 per case, Obsolete

  • Our 3M™ Cartridge Roll 747D is ideal for metal finishing in small hard to reach areas like corners or inside pipes
  • These cartridge rolls feature a blend of aluminum oxide and 3M™ ceramic grain on a strong cotton backing around a solid mandrel core
  • Available in both tapered and regular designs.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Multi-layer, multi-wear design enhances abrasive longevity and helps produce a consistent cut
  • Ceramic aluminum oxide blended mineral breaks down to reveal sharp cutting edges
  • Anti-friction grinding aid reduces grinding temperatures and helps abrasive run smooth
  • Available tapered shape is ideal for blending, deburring and polishing in hard-to-reach areas
  • Arbor hole accommodates mandrel tool attachment used by a variety of tools
